thread.title: Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian Break Up Again
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian Break Up Again

author: Celebuzz
title: Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian Break Up Again
text:
Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian have split for what feels like the umpteenth time . 
Us Weekly is reporting that the couple, who welcomed a child together last November , have parted ways after one year together. Sources say Kardashian has been constantly fighting with his fiancée after Chyna moved out of their shared home with their newborn daughter, Dream , over the holidays. 
“Rob thinks it’s the right decision,” an insider says of the latest fallout. “Chyna has disappeared for days at a time without communicating or providing any updates. This won’t end well.” 14 Photos » 
Another source adds that Chyna has been “yelling and screaming about how his family doesn’t like or support her, and his insecurities.” 
On Valentine’s Day, Chyna only shared a photo of her mom with rose pedals arranged into the shape of the heart. The mother-of-two did not specify who had sent the flowers. A post shared by blacchyna snapchats (@blacchynasnapchats) on Feb 15, 2017 at 5:37pm PST 
Breakup rumors started swirling earlier this month when Chyna was spotted getting cozy with another man at a Super Bowl viewing party in Los Angeles. At the time, an onlooker claimed the mom-of-two was telling guests that “she’s still talking to Rob but they’re not living together right now.”
